TEXT.TITLE: KAYPRO <KPRO.O> DEALER WINS NETWORKING CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: <Alaska Micro Systems>, a Kaypro dealer, said the Anchorage School District chose it to provide 116,000 dlrs of computer equipment to Chugiak High School for computer and typing classes. Reuter
